How old is Eric Gordon?

Eric Gordon is 36 years old.

Where was Eric Gordon born?

Eric Gordon was born in Indianapolis, Indiana.

When was Eric Gordon born?

Eric Gordon was born on December 25, 1988.

How tall is Eric Gordon?

Eric Gordon is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Eric Gordon weigh?

Eric Gordon weighs 215 lbs (97 kg).

Is Eric Gordon in the Hall of Fame?

Eric Gordon is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Eric Gordon drafted?

Eric Gordon was drafted by Los Angeles Clippers, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position does Eric Gordon play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

Eric Gordon averages 2.7 points, 0.0 rebounds, and 0.3 assists per game.
